title: And now for something completely different
creator_credit: Ian Macnaughton, Patricia Casey and Python Productions
brief_description: Monty Python’s Flying Circus strikes again in this hilarious anthology of the funniest sketches from the legendary BBC television series starring John Cleese, Graham Chapman, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones and Michael Palin.
